Introduction.text: Let's learn the basics of python ! Here you will learn about python variable types, conditional statements, data structures and loops. To do this, I will use various youtube channels, slides and interactive questions. Let's get started !

Hello world.text: Learn how to open python and print your first message with this animated video.

Conditional statements.text: Note: it is now preferable to use input() instead of raw_input() in python 3.

Dictionnaries.text: Note: in a recent python update, dictionnaries keep track of the order in which you inserted keys.

Range loop.text: A very common loop to do is a range loop. It will create as many loop cycles as indicated in the range fonction. Here is an exemple:
Range loop.text1: Note: the number in the range parenthesis indicates the number of loop cycles that you want. Count the number of times the variable i was printed on the screen and you will see that it is exaclty what happened.
